data.event: It is the capital of the province of Chiriquí and has an estimated population of 144,858 inhabitants as confirmed in 2013.
David was founded in 1602, by Francisco de Gama, advisor to the governor Juan López de Siqueira and under his mandate.

event.title: the first battle of the "Thousand Days

data.event: In March 1900, the Bolívar Park was the scene of the first battle of the "Thousand Days' War", between liberals and conservatives who would later march on towards the capital to wage war against each other.
